com.gelwins.base
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  lib.net.sockets.ConnectionAdapter<T>
      lib.net.sockets.ConnectionsManager<byte[]>
          com.gelwins.base.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
lib.net.sockets.ConnectionListener<byte[]>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BingoController, KenoController, MixballController, SekaController, UpdownController
public abstract class Controller
extends lib.net.sockets.ConnectionsManager<byte[]>

Basic class for various game controllers

Controller holds:

- all client connections

- list of rooms called lobby

- two pools of db connections

- instance of the logger class

Each socket connection created by Server is passed to controller and is held until client will be disconnected.

Main metohd of the class is messageReceived where all the client requests are processed.

It first determines the requested client action then reads the corresponding parameter

and next passes the action and parameter to the room associated requester connection.

Please note that Controller holds one connection per user login so each connection uniquely

determines the (user, room) pair
